content: Colonization of destinations in space not covered in other sections. Examples may include floating cities in the clouds of Venus, heliocentric orbit (if that is to be treated separately from geocentric orbit), the Asteroid Belt, Europa, Titan, the Kuiper Belt, the Oort Cloud, transtellar space, interstellar, etc. The purpose, though, is not to review every possibility but add material that is relevant to thinking about space policy in the near term.
